Keywords: Cosmic , Eternal , Warrior
Real Name: Thena
Special Powers
GODS HIDDEN AMONG MORTALS: Until Thena makes an attack, takes damage, or is the last character on your force, she can't be targeted by non-adjacent opposing characters.
WARRIOR, SCHOLAR, ETERNAL: Outwit. When she uses it, if she chose a standard power the target can use, she can use that power until your next turn.
THE ART OF WAR: Impervious. // When Thena is the only target of an attack, before the attack is rolled, you may modify either the attacker's attack or damage -1.

Comments
January 7, 2022
Hellboy the Bellboy
I usually disregard characters with higher point values that have 0 range but after playing her I have to say she's solid. The "Gods hidden among mortals" trait gives her a good chance of getting a hit in before she takes any damage. Her special defense helps a lot with her survivability as well. While she most likely won't be making a splash in 300pt competitive I'll say she's right at home in 400-500pt teams.
December 8, 2021
Goop
I love the outwit trait, i love the defensive power. Expensive at 150 but with her above average stats and power selection i think she's worth it.
